data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 3
data.short_description: Quickswitcher mention badge gets cut off without any unread marker
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Make sure you have no unread servers - Get mentioned in any server that you have muted - Open the quickswitcher by clicking on its icon - Observe the mention badge for your servers listed there
